channel.title: Comments on: Read it in the Sunday Papers

item.title: By: heather (errantdreams)
item.dc:creator: heather (errantdreams)
item.description: And yet, I met my now-husband at a tabletop game, and we've been together for 11 years...
item.content:encoded: And yet, I met my now-husband at a tabletop game, and we’ve been together for 11 years…

item.title: By: Aufero
item.dc:creator: Aufero
item.description:
That's not a valid flowchart!
But I guess I already knew I was a rules lawyer. Bottom left corner it is.
item.content:encoded:
That’s not a valid flowchart!

But I guess I already knew I was a rules lawyer. Bottom left corner it is.

item.title: By: Lottomannen
item.dc:creator: Lottomannen
item.description:
Nice article from the Times there.
Am I the only one stuck in a eternal loop in that diagram? I can't get out!
item.content:encoded:
Nice article from the Times there.

Am I the only one stuck in a eternal loop in that diagram?
I can’t get out!

item.title: By: nordee
item.dc:creator: nordee
item.description: I was going to make a comment about Sci Fi leading to Gandalf, and then realized that I was stuck in the lower left corner of the diagram.
item.content:encoded: I was going to make a comment about Sci Fi leading to Gandalf, and then realized that I was stuck in the lower left corner of the diagram.
